item.title: Book Your Service
item.description:
How to Book Your Appointment

Booking your mobile hair service is simple and convenient. Fill out the form below, and I’ll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss any specific requirements.

What to Expect

Once you submit your booking request:

  1. Confirmation: I’ll contact you within 24 hours to confirm availability
  2. Consultation: We’ll discuss your hair needs and practical requirements
  3. Preparation: I’ll arrive 15 minutes early to set up my mobile service station
  4. Service: Enjoy reliable hair services that save you time and hassle
  5. Aftercare: Receive practical tips for maintaining your style at home

Preparation Tips

  • Ensure adequate lighting and access to an electrical outlet
  • Have a comfortable chair available
  • For longer services, access to water is helpful but not required
  • Remove any valuable items from the service area
  • Wear a button-up shirt for easy changing after color services

Payment Options

  • Cash
  • E-transfer
  • Credit card (mobile terminal available)

A 25% deposit may be required for first-time clients or services over $200.

item.title: Color & Highlights
item.description:
Straightforward color services for when you need a refresh without the salon markup. I keep it simple - basic colors, root touch-ups, and simple highlights that work for everyday life.

Base Service Includes:

  • Root touch-ups (single process)
  • Basic gray coverage n- Simple all-over color
  • Quick consultation to match your current shade

Available Add-Ons:

  • Simple highlights (partial): +$15
  • Toner/glaze for shine: +$10
  • Deep conditioning treatment: +$12

What I Don’t Do:

  • Complex color corrections
  • Fashion colors (vivid blues, pinks, etc.)
  • Bleach and tone services
  • Multi-dimensional balayage

Why Keep It Simple? As a mobile stylist, I carry essential color products that cover the most common needs. For complex color work, I recommend visiting a full-service salon. But for maintaining your current color or covering roots? I’ve got you covered at a price that makes sense.
